subject: Personal Finance
title: Lifestyle Inflation
description: Learn Lifestyle Inflation in one minute.

hook.text: You get a raise. Within months, your spending rises to match. You still can't save.

buildup.text: Lifestyle inflation happens when spending grows as fast as income, leaving savings unchanged.

discovery.text: A family earning $150,000 can feel as cash-strapped as one earning $50,000 if spending scales up.

twist.text: The hedonic treadmill means each upgrade feels normal within weeks. You adapt and want more.

climax.text: The only way off the treadmill is to save the raise before you get used to having it.

punchline.text: More income doesn't mean more savings.

quiz.question: What is lifestyle inflation?
options: Spending rising to match income increases
Prices rising due to luxury goods
